scripts.validate: npm run validate:references && npm run check:duplicates
scripts.bundle:assets: npm run bundle:css && npm run hash:js
scripts.search:copy: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const src = '_site_normalized/pagefind'; const dest = '_site/pagefind'; fs.cpSync(src, dest, {recursive: true});"
scripts.search:cleanup: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); fs.rmSync('_site_normalized', {recursive: true, force: true});"
scripts.search:index: npm run search:normalize && npm run search:pagefind && npm run search:copy && npm run search:cleanup
